column1: Amazon is great for almost anything you need.
I have shopped at Amazon for many years now with no issues.
Excellent customer service.
Best overall. Website, app, services, products, quality, speed, and trusting.
Easy to use for ordering and keeping track of. New deals up to 80% every day!
I love this place. From my tablet to DVDs and candy.  Great prices fast shipping
Greatest online shop ever! Very satisfied.
I was really surprised by their timely delivery of my order! The parcel was packed quite well and the quality was awesome, I like them! Thanks!
Amazing, I order all my things from amazon.com, they are the powerhouse of good deals & super fast delivery...

My number ONE store! You can get everything you need. Being a prime member, I always get my order in two days. Some products are eligible for same day delivery! I get a lot of free movies as well. I'm very happy with Amazon.com.
I love Amazon! Amazon Prime is the best. I love ordering things and having them on my doorstep two days later.
I love to browse Amazon. There are so many things I can find that are not in my local stores. I have never had trouble with buying from Amazon.
Great service and fast delivery with amazon prime. I love it

I'm crazy about Amazon! Here I can find everything - from kitchen utensils to fur coat. And I really like prices. Is usually lower then in shops and markets. And all this sales, discounts... I like to buy things in internet! Maybe I'm really lucky but I never had any problems with seller or delivery. And every time I'm enjoying high quality of my orders! Amazon is the best! Use it all the time and recommend it to all my friends.
Got my blue color power bank on Amazon with Brand "AFENDO" Perfect item!!!
Amazon is a life saver! A+ They are doing it right from my prospective.
Amazon hasn't been too bad. I have only had to return 1/50 of my orders for the past three months. I LOVE the site!

OMG & WOW that Amazon has received such low ratings!  THIS WEBSITE IS AWESOME & THE GO-TO PLACE FOR THE BEST PRICES ON EVERYTHING!!   I JUST DISCOVERED THIS WEBSITE & WANTED TO SHARE THE AWESOME EXPERIENCES I'VE HAD.  NO ONE HAS ASKED ME TO WRITE THIS REVIEW!

Probably my most favorite shopping site. Over the years they have started to add items (groceries, delivery, clothing, etc.) and it is just simply enormous. The prices, ratings, reviews, extent of products and brands of same-type product can almost be over-whelming.

Amazon has always been wonderful. UPS lost a few orders because my apartment is very difficult to find and Amazon sent me a replacement at no cost with 2 day shipping. Couldn't be happier with Amazon's service over the years. Although now I just pick up my orders from a local UPS Store to avoid lost orders. That works out much better for me. I've also had very good experiences with various sellers who sell through Amazon.I highly recommend them!
Love Amazon! Always fast shipping and great C/S!
I have purchased ASUS zenfone 5 mobile from Amazon. I got it the next day. Great store......!
They are definitely legit for sure! They are promising, very supportive and, they have lots of amazing products!
Good service! purchased a car mount 2 weeks ago, pleased
I ordered from Amazon more than once, never had a problem.  Always good prices, fast delivery, never had a problem.
The customer service was extremely helpful on getting a resolution. I can't think of anything negative to say about this company! Everything is 5 stars
I use Amazon All the time to buy books, birthday gifts, and what ever I might not find in the Stores. I recommend Amazon.com to everyone.
I can typically find whatever I need, whenever.
Powerful shopping paradise.
Bought cell phone accessories from it. Very satisfied.

Shipping time has been incredibly fast with their free shipping and final delivery by USPS.  Everything ordered arrived in perfect condition, well-packed.  I couldn't be more pleased with an online shopping experience.
I think that Amazon is one of the best online shopping website out there.   Amazon has always fulfilled every purchase I have made quickly and efficiently.
Incredible experience.
Amazon is a brilliant selling platform, that permits price shopping for common or uncommon items.
Shipping, service, selection, and price are all excellent.
Good product, fair pricing, quick transaction
r Amazon great buying experience
Amazing customer service, On time delivery.Quality products.Great Deals.
Easily the best online business model on the internet today.
Great customer service whenever a problem arrises, which is pretty infrequently.
Got everything quickly and was a good price.
Amazon and the service has been outstanding. Prices are very good.
Amazon service is the best.
Nice online shop, I wish it would ship more items to my country.
Really Fast shipping. Thanks!
I love amazon lol seriously. they have yet to fail me.
Best refund experience ever.quick response, free shipping label.
Great company. Amazon is Amazing.
Very fast, easy, convenient to use. Completely hassle-free return and refunds. Great job!
Shopping with confidence. Great customer service.
The cheapest place I could find the item I was looking for. Shipping was quick, packaging was a very sturdy.
Amazon is the best e-retailer. Prime is the best too.
fantastic customer service. I use amazon all the time and love my prime membership.  Amazon rocks.
Item details accurate. Fast shipping, Good price, would definitely buy from again
Amazon has some of the best prices found online, and their shipping is extremely fast.
I love amazon!! If you really search you can find anything you need!
Easy to shop, a lot of reviews, good customer service.
Nice product and reasonable price
Amazon is reliable and  fast shipping. i like  shopping there
Always can count on Amazon
The website is easy to navigate and to search for items with keywords.
Polite, professional and extremely helpful staff
Great prices with a rebate and free shipping .
I have never had a problem with Best Buy.
Always fast, always accurate, always a deal.
Always have been good to work with.  When I have had a problem they fixed it quickly and to my satisfaction.
Great service - reliable, trustworthy, and all-encompassing.
Very sweet. Easy order, fast shpping. Nice deal. customer service is excellent. Staples is reliable.
Very smooth transaction.
order filled accurately and promptly.  contents were well-packaged and shipped as promised.  great experience!
